alert.note: Alert for Benton; Morgan; St. Clair (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 08 at 2:43AM CDT until June 08 at 3:30AM CDT by NWS Springfield
info.description: The National Weather Service in Springfield has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Benton County in central Missouri... Northeastern St. Clair County in west central Missouri... Northwestern Morgan County in central Missouri... * Until 330 AM CDT. * At 243 AM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near La Monte to near Windsor to near Deepwater, moving southeast at 55 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Truman Lake... Truman State Park... Warsaw... Lincoln... Cole Camp... Stover... Syracuse... Ionia... Palo Pinto... Lakeview Heights... Florence... Brandon... Crockerville... Zora... Iconium... Racket... Edmonson... Mora... Whitakerville... HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
